name: com.unity.transport
description: Unity network transport layer - the low-level interface for connecting and sending data through a network

_upm.changelog:
### Changes
* Revert to Collections 2.1.0-pre.6 as pre.7 is not promoted yet.

samples.description: Very simple client and server implementations using jobs. Meant to tie in with the package documentation.
Small application to compute round-trip time (ping) between client and server.
Small application to compute round-trip time (ping) between client and host, using Unity Relay.
Simplest possible client and server implementations. Meant to tie in with the package documentation.
